department: Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) - Department of National Defence (DND)
short_summary: Supply of Replacement, Repair and Maintenance of all Overhead door structures
description: Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply of Replacement, Repair and Maintenance of all Overhead door structures for the Department of National Defence, 17 Wing Winnipeg, MB.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

[Title and Reference Information]
- **Title:** Overhead Door Maintenance and Repair Version 2
- **Reference Number:** WS4248357146

[Procurement Details]
- **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)
- **Procurement Category:** SRV
- **Procurement Method:** Open Bidding
- **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer

[Contract Description]
A Royal Individual Standing Offer (RISO) is required to supply replacement, repair, and maintenance services for all overhead door structures at 17 Wing Winnipeg, Manitoba.

**The Contract:**

- **Contract Type:** Standing Offer
- **Contract Duration:** Contract award to February 28, 2026
- **Option Period:** Up to three (3) one-year options periods

**Key Requirements:**

- **Submission Deadline:** March 5, 2024, 14:00 EST
- **Compliance:** Bidders must comply with all requirements identified in the Annex Statement of Work and the Solicitation documents.
- **Notice:** Debriefing or feedback sessions will be provided to Offerors who requested it for the previous solicitation.

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Willy Zumbado Diaz
* **Email:** [willy.zumbado.diaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:willy.zumbado.diaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** (Not available)
* **Address:** Department of Public Works and Government Services, 11 Laurier St. Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5

[Notice URL]
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18837325?extsite=MTg4MzczMjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

[Notice Language]
English and French

 Submission of compliant bids in both languages is required. Non-conforming bids will be declared as non-responsive. You may submit only one response per bidder. Successful suppliers will be included within the standing offer. 

 Please note that the listing is expired. Please review the TRADE AGREEMENTs to identify any relevant trade agreements.
 
No Change History was reported. You may consider making aware changes since submission.
